definitions.text: the state of being silent (as when no one is speaking)

examples: he needed silence in order to sleep

definitions.text: a refusal to speak when expected
examples: his silence about my contribution was surprising

definitions.text: the trait of keeping things secret
cause to be quiet or not talk
examples: Please silence the children in the church!

definitions.text: keep from expression, for example by threats or pressure
examples: All dissenters were silenced when the dictator assumed power
